title: At 30 years old, how do I go about getting a degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: Figure out what you want to go to school for, do some research on different programs at different schools where the degree is offered, looking into the costs and how you will pay for it or apply for financial aid, talk to an admissions advisor at the school, and apply! Go for it!

Tons of online schools out there. What do you want to learn? Unfortunately, I’ve been around a lot of people in online schools. Maybe someone can prove me wrong, but it seems a lot of the work is group work and not everyone shares the workload. A lot of freeloaders in the group. And the teachers do not want to hear about this problem they just want the final product for grade.
